alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 17 at 5:47PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A gusty shower will impact portions of south central Hamilton, northwestern Fulton and east central Herkimer Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 545 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gusty shower over Stratford, or 11 miles northeast of Little Falls, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Dolgeville, Stratford, Caroga Lake, Oppenheim, Arietta, Oregon, Curtis, Clockmill Corners, Pinnacle, Lotville, Rasbach Corner, Doxtater Corner, Knappville, Shaker Place, Tomantown, Shedd Corners, Phipps Corners, Powley Place, Wheelerville and Canada Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Northern Fulton; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer
